duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical assistance and training for nonprofit loan packagers in the USDA 502 Direct Loan Application Packaging.
Ensure compliance of loan files with programmatic and administrative regulations and submit files to USDA.
Produce loan packages of quality and quantity, ensuring compliance by RCAC and Qualified Employers.
Work closely with lending partners and agencies, providing technical assistance in homeownership program development.
Promote and facilitate partnerships to maximize resources, preparing activity and outcome reports.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Housing Development, Affordable Mortgage Lending, or Housing Counseling (Master's preferred)
